verbose_text: Several of the top hits were screened at concentrations between 0.1 and 10 mM, and we found that the FDA approved anti-mycobacterial drug clofazimine inhibited Cx46 GJIC at the lowest concentrations compared to the other hits (XREF_FIG), with little effect on Cx46 hemichannel activity, as determined by the amount of calcein lost from sparsely plated cells (XREF_FIG).
